data.message: 1- He doesn't rap about money because he doesn't like to be show off like other rappers do 2- He doesn't rap about bitches and when he do he do it just for fun  not like the other rappers do normal routine 3-He doesn't  rap about love like others rappers do  and when he do he rap about what he been through in his  life4-He raps about his life and what he been through in his life not like rappers do rap about bitches and money and drugs 5-He doesn't post on his facebook page or twitter  vote for me like every one does because he doesn't give  a fuck about awards even from the beginning how ever he got  97M+      6-He doesn't post personal picture on his facebook page and on twitter   like everyone one  does  because he doesn't like to go out to public and say here  i amBecause he likes his  privacy 7-His lyrics from what he feels8- He writes his own lyrics    9-He writes  his lyrics to makes you depend on your self not on other not  likes other rappers do becouse  no one  gives fuck about you Eminem does  because he wants to help people from what he been  through 10-When he made movie he made it about his life not the ohere do about love 11-He  was dreaming  to be the best rapper ever then he became the rapper ever Despite the difficulties faced in his life that like (Failure in high school and The criticism directed at him because of his frist album( Infinite) and the Racism he faced when he wanted to be Rapper because of his  color skin  And his problem with Kim and his mother)it's didn't stop him from that to be RapGod Eminem<3
